name: SIGMA (BulletChain)
description:
SIGMAAn FPS game that simulates the style of the late 1990s

The game was approved on March 13, 2022 and its development ended on June 2, 2022.

Game background: in 2025, the United Nations established an anti-terrorism force code named sigma. The United Nations, which usually yearns for peace, actually selected the last survivors in the way of "four people Massacre" and then incorporated them into sigma troops.

Hey, boy! Take your weapon! Do you want a shotgun or an automatic shotgun? Or sniper rifles and plasma rifles? These have nothing to do with me! Take your weapon. In order to become a member of Sigma team, fight with other people who also want to become a member of Sigma team, and the winner will become a member of Sigma team! Oh, by the way, are you going to fight in the village filled with waste water, or in the ancient ruins in the forest? Or the factory in the dusk, or the remote Mars base, these are up to you to choose!
